# read the first line of the input
import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())

if n == 0:
    print(0)
    exit()
# n > 0
if n > 0:
    res = []
    while n > 0:
        res.append(str(n % 2))
        n //= 2
    print("".join(res[::-1]))
    exit()

# n < 0
n = abs(n)
res = []
while n > 0:
    if n % 2 == 0:
        res.append("1")
        n = (n // 2) + 1
    else:
        res.append("0")
        n //= 2

print("1" + "".join(res[::-1]))

n = int(input()) #输入一个数字

if n == 0: #如果是0，直接输出0
    print(0)
    exit()

ans = "" #ans为最终的结果
while n != 0: #如果n不等于0
    if n % (-2) == 0: #如果n除以-2的余数是0
        ans += "0" #ans加上0
        n = n // (-2) #n等于n除以-2
    else:
        ans += "1" #ans加上1
        n = n // (-2) + 1 #n等于n除以-2+1

print(ans[::-1]) #输出ans的倒序
